Package CS509.client.airport

Class TimeConversion

java.lang.Object
CS509.client.airport.TimeConversion
public class TimeConversion extends Object
Gets the GMT time and returns the Local time at that airport. Uses timezonedb.com api once to save all the time zones and GMT offsets in timezone_data.csv file. Uses timezone_data.csv for all the calculations Returns the string of local time

  • Method Details

    • convertToTimeZone

      public static String convertToTimeZone(String gmtTime, String airportCode) throws DateTimeParseException
      Converts the time in GMT into time local to the given airport code
      Parameters:
      gmtTime - time in GMT
      airportCode - Code of Airport
      Returns:
      Time in zone local to the airport in yyyy MMM dd HH:mm zzz format.
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException

    • startofDay

      public static String startofDay(String date)
      Calculates the start of the day and returns Date and Time for the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - in yyyy_MM_dd format
      Returns:
      date in yyyy_MM_dd HH:mm format with HH:mm being 00:00

    • endofDay

      public static String endofDay(String date)
      Calculates the end of the day and returns Date and Time for the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - in yyyy_MM_dd format
      Returns:
      date in yyyy_MM_dd HH:mm format with HH:mm being 23:59

    • convertToGMT

      public static String convertToGMT(String localTime, String airportCode) throws DateTimeParseException
      Converts time local to the airport to GMT
      Parameters:
      localTime - local time of airport
      airportCode - code of airport
      Returns:
      date in yyyy_MM_dd HH:mm GMT format
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException

    • dateBetweentwoDates

      public static boolean dateBetweentwoDates(String date, String departTime, String airportCode)
      Checks if the given datetime is between two other datetimes.
      Parameters:
      date - date
      departTime - departure time
      airportCode - code of airport
      Returns:
      True if the departTime is in the 24 hours of given date (yyyy_MM_dd).

    • getNextDate

      public static String getNextDate(String dateString)
      Gets a date and return the date of next day
      Parameters:
      dateString - date
      Returns:
      date of next day

    • getZones

      public static void getZones(Airports airport)
      Uses timezonedb api to store the gmtOffset, and the timezone abbreviation for all the available airports into timezone_data.csv file
      Parameters:
      airport - ArrayList of airports

    • loctime

      public static String loctime(Airports airport, String time, String code)
      Driver function for converting the time zones. Checks if the airport code is valid and subsequestly calls the convertToTimeZone function with given gmt time and airport code.
      Parameters:
      airport - airport
      time - time
      code - Airport Code
      Returns:
      returns output of convertToTimeZone which is Time in zone local to the airport in yyyy MMM dd HH:mm zzz format.
